brief_summary.textblock:
Studies investigating physiological processes involved in aging-related deficits in
      regulation of stress hormone systems.

clinical_study.brief_title: Age-Related Changes in Stress Hormone Regulation

criteria.textblock:
Exclusion Criteria:

          -  History of major psychiatric disorders,

          -  Neurologic disorder affecting cognitive function,

          -  Unstable medical problems,

          -  Medications including antidepressants, neuroleptics, anxiolytics, CNS stimulants,
             narcotic analgesics, anti-convulsants,

          -  Drugs effecting HPA axis function,

          -  Vision and hearing deficits,

          -  Undergoing major life event within one month or

          -  Loss of family member within 6 months.

facility.name: VA Puget Sound Health Care System

clinical_study.official_title: Mechanism of Aging-Related Changes in (HPA) Hydrocortisone Corticotropin Feedback Function

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.
